title: How to Set Up Remote Desktop Printing

steps.title: Download the drivers for your local printer.
steps.content: Download the drivers for your local printer.

steps.title: Set up a printer on the Remote desktop system, using the lpt1 port
steps.content: Set up a printer on the Remote desktop system, using the lpt1 port

steps.title: Install Printer Software and choose have disk.
steps.content: Install Printer Software and choose have disk. Browse to the folder you put the drivers in.

steps.title: Once you have installed the printer on the lpt1 port, you log off.
steps.content: Once you have installed the printer on the lpt1 port, you log off.

steps.title: On your RDP icon (if you have created one), right click and edit.
steps.content: On your RDP icon (if you have created one), right click and edit.

steps.title: Choose the local resources tab and check printers.
steps.content: Choose the local resources tab and check printers.

steps.title: On general tab, save your settings.
steps.content: On general tab, save your settings.

steps.title: Log on, and you will then see your printers.
steps.content: Log on, and you will then see your printers.

steps.title: Delete the one you just setup on lpt1.
steps.content: Delete the one you just setup on lpt1. Set the new one as your default. Test your printer by right clicking on the printer and go to properties and print test page.
